short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make a dictionary for acronyms in a paper

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scientists love to use acronyms, abbreviations, and initialisms in their papers! As a reader, it sometimes gets hard keeping track of the "alphabet soup". This plugin can help solve that problem! When reading a scientific article in your browser, click on the "Catstronaut" icon to create an alphabetized list of what everything stands for! Happy researching!
